pkgmetadata.longdescription: The Intel® Open Path Guiding Library (Intel® Open PGL) implements a set of representations and training algorithms needed to integrate path guiding into a renderer. Open PGL offers implementations of current state-of-the-art path guiding methods, which increase the sampling quality and, therefore, the efficiency of a renderer. The goal of Open PGL is to provide implementations that are well tested and robust enough to be used in a production environment.
